11.content: Which kind of weight gain for cathy?
11.title: cathy (the young alien)

111.content:
It was a loud day in singletown schools cafeteria, as young Cathy Smith was sitting with her friends really enjoying her meal.

"Oh Wow" she said joyfully "This earth food is good stuff, even better than Rhapsodian frazferters!"

"Well don't eat to much Cathy, or you'll turn into a blimp." said Chris the groups cautionary scientist

"Don't worry Chris if that happens I'm sure she can just stretch back." Said Sam the leader.

"Yeah, for a Rhapsodian thats a real easy task." Cathy replied bubbly

1 hour later


Cathy let out a massive burp as she walked home on a full stomach

"That was good food."

She was alone at this point because all her friends had gone home in order to prepare for the weekend.
As she walked, she came across a shady man wearing a hat.
"Damn girl!" he said rudely "You got a great future behind you."
How does she respond to this.
111.title: Eating

choices: "I'll talk to Christ about later" She goes to school and at lunch she over eats.
"It's settled I'm not gonna worry " She decides to let herself get fatter.
"That's it I'm calling that mystery man" (Quicker weight gain )
1111.content:
The alien girl turned to the man slightly with soft eyes as she rubbed her full stomach absently.
"I'm sorry what?" She looked at the mysterious man who quickly took off his hat and made a bowing gesture to her in what most sensible people would call a mocking imitation of an honorable man you could trust. "You've got quite an appetite my dear, though I fear that you have much greater potential than you've allowed yourself to explore. I won't pester you further just yet but, I ask of you. . . eat your limit of these new worldly foods that you enjoy so fondly. If you find that you enjoy such indulgent pleasure just call the number or if your truly excited about meeting me in secret for the thrill of it, you are welcome to browse my web site. I'll look forward to seeing you." He hands her a slip of note card paper with a bulbous apple on its monogram a web address only reachable at nightfall and a phone number in red ink. She was about to ask more about the card but was stopped when she felt the mans hand pat her on the head. "I'll leave you to decide the rest. Now run along and enjoy yourself I look forward to seeing you. . . . grow to your full potential ,but until then have sweet dreams tonight."
Cathy was stunned by all of this and made her way to home that night.
As the night reached 6:00 AM Cathy was making her way through a pile of around 6 to 7 burgers she had saved from her part time job on the weekends.
The bloated stomach she had acquired from this was erotic in minor ways. She ran her hands gingerly over the smooth skin wondering what to do as she spoke aloud her thoughts knowing no-one but her pet jelly fish that she kept would hear her. "I don't wanna be as big as a blimp, but then again I can't see food filling me with hot air at all. . . . maybe Chris was just 'pulling her leg" as he often put it?" She finally stood up clasping her hands together with a clap sound.
Saying. . . . .
1111.title: Ignorantly

121.content:
"All right! Attack him!" Sam shouted.

The other fired at the alien. He was yellow and his body was long and very thin. The eyes in his long head were yellow and seemed like lights. his mouth was tiny. He seemed to don't have a skeleton since his arms, legs and body waved when he avoid the lasers of the MBC.

"Take this spaghetti monster! Sam shouted and almost hit his head.

The alien did't seem to be too pleased by this and a ray suddenly shoot out of his hand and hit Sam.

"Oh Sam are you all right?" Cathy asked concerned.

Sam's body was shaking but in 10 seconds her body stopped shaking and she seemed like her old self and suddenly shoot at the alien who was't really prepared for that. He was shot back and this gave Danny and Cathy enough time to hit him again and for Chris to suck him up.

"I got him. Are you all right Sam?"

"Don't worry. It's nothing. I'm just a bit dizzy."

"I know those aliens. They are supposed to be one of the most beautiful aliens in the universe because of the long and slender bodies." Cathy said.

"Beautiful. Maybe at you planet but here on earth the're not called beautiful. They more called: ieuwh!" Danny said.

"Well i sometimes look in those magazines of you about earth fashion and the girls there that wear clothes are also slender and have long legs. So we're not so different." Caty said with a grin.

"Eh guys it's getting late. It's time for dinner and i still need to put this little alien too the club house."

"Yeah we need to go too. Dinner sounds great. I feel very hungry." Sam said.

When Sam ran into her house her mother looked at her.

"Good you're here. We were just about too start dinner."

"Sorry i'm late i just forgot time. What's for dinner?"

"Spinach, baked potatoes and some delicious steak. Do you like that?"

"Oh you bet. I'm so hungry!"

Sam started too wolf the food down like she was starved. The spinach was gone in less then a minute and her parents were surprised seeing their daughter eat like this. Sam fast finished the potatoes and after that the steak also was gone in a record time.

"What?" Sam asked when she saw her parents looking not noticing she cleaned her plate in less then five minutes.

She put her fork down and it hit the plate.

"He is it all gone already. I'm more hungry then i thought."

"Sam is everything all right with you?" Her mother asked.

"Sure mom. Everything is fine. Can i have some more food?"

"Eh sure. Help yourself."

Sam ate all of the remaining potatoes and spinach. There were't any more steaks. After Sam finished the last crumb she looked at her parents and asked: "So what's for dessert?"
121.title: Alien attack
